ModMetaData.name: VGP Garden Resources (Medieval Tech Patch)
ModMetaData.author: Maaxar
ModMetaData.description:
Patches various medieval smelter mods to allow smelting the plants from dismarzero's VGP Garden Resources mod.
Patched mods include:
Lord of the Rims: The Third Age
Lord of the Rims: Unlimited
Medieval Times
Fueled Smelter
Requires VGP Garden Resources to do anything useful.
Thank you to dismarzero for his awesome mod.
Let me know if there is another smelter mod you would like patched.
